data.text: @bt_uk How can I contact BT Open Reach is @BTSopenreach an official account?
@bt_uk Morning. I've got some old routers of yours and want to return them for recycling, but can't seem to find out how on your website. Can you please advise? Thanks.
@bt_uk your internet sucks a big one. Switches off throughout the day everyday. Thank the lord I‚Äôm leaving. Just squeezing this in before it GOES FUCKING OFF AGAIN. have a nice day.
@FMDoop @bt_uk You can come stream with me! I have a super long desk and a spare gaming laptop already set up, you can share the seat with me though‚Ä¶ üòâüòÇü§£
@bt_uk For 2 days before upgrading I was trying to add a monthly pass and it wouldnt let me. Customer service is to resolve the matter in a way that is satisfactory to the PAYING customer!

@bt_uk Thanks Janet - but there‚Äôs the cop out. It‚Äôs well known that the big 4 invest in fossil fuels & other climate destruction. BT should be actively changing bank/ lobbying them to change if truly committed to minimising impact on the environment. Money is the most powerful lever.
@bt_uk Have sent DM!

This whole process is exhausting. no accountability at @OpenreachHelp despite the delay now being theirs, continue to be let down by @bt_uk who are not advocating on my behalf and failing to contact me as agreed. When can you intervene, please @Ofcom?

@bt_uk Is your 22 billion pound annual revenue invested in fossil fuels? Because if you don‚Äôt have a financial decarbonisation strategy, you‚Äôre effectively funding climate destruction. Thanks for responding, and at least you‚Äôre engaging in dialogue.

@bt_uk For a fault, it seems the internet and phone line has came back on overnight. No problem, it‚Äôs for a senior specialist faults engineer, I‚Äôll let them know that the fault is fixed. Thank you
@bt_uk Because I shouldn‚Äôt have to create an entirely new account!

@bt_uk my Wearside phone directory that claims it‚Äôs *your local Phone Book has *Howay man! written across the front of it

It‚Äôs spelt & pronounced ha‚Äôway man on Wearside https://t.co/N8OQPHaGuw
@bt_uk I need to cancel an engineer appointment for today, can this be done please? Struggling to get through on the phone

@bt_uk I‚Äôm still getting no answer to the question does your bank (and therefore my money) get invested in fossil fuels? All your decarbonisation efforts are great but if your bank invests in fossil fuels you‚Äôre cancelling all that out effectively.

@bt_uk you are an absolute joke. Just upgraded my fibre to a better package with you and am being told I am unable to add a monthly pass for BT Sport to watch UFC London because of it. You are literally sending a new hub out! Absolutely appalling service!

And also to highlight poor responses from @bt_uk who fobbed me off & said their climate strategy was on the website (it‚Äôs impossible to find  & says nothing about their finance & climate strategy) & @VodafoneUK who made no response at all. So that‚Äôs two companies I‚Äôll be leaving.

@bt_uk hi, I have a question: I have previously spoken to a CSR & he said that he had "left a note on [my] account" about the issue. I spoke to a different CSR, but she couldn't see any notes. Can i get a copy of these things?
@bt_uk issue with our line since 2pm yesterday and the best you can do is an engineer on Monday how can I escalate this
@bt_uk told crew would be here at 8am to work on the internet as I need to work from home, 8:10 and no sign of them, my anxiety levels are through the roof so cheers
@bt_uk Please refer to original tweet

@Tonysmini @bt_uk @OpenreachHelp thx. maybe you can help with this too ? 1. all broadband providers will use these or only BT ? 2. having one very nearby helps to get closer to theorical speed ? cheers
@bt_uk That seems to be my #btsport service ended‚Ä¶.so why am I charged up to 10th April? I understand if this is going to be refunded but seriously a company like #bt have a system like this?
@bt_uk  why are you charging me ¬£65 for same service? https://t.co/gNDTUPkYpK

@bt_uk shocked to see how so many people (including me) have reported your service to be broken FOR DAYS and nothing has been done to fix it. Shameful. At least provide us with free mobile broadband while something is done. We are paying you at the end of the day.
